titles.title: Friends of Kaloko-Honokohau Act of 1993
Na Hoa Pili Kaloko-Honokohau Re-establishment Act of 1993
Na Hoa Pili Kaloko-Honokohau Re-establishment Act of 1993
A bill to amend the National Parks and Recreation Act of 1978 to establish the Friends of Kaloko-Honokohau, an advisory commission for the Kaloko-Honokohau National Park, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S4408)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

committee.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

action.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks.

committee.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

action.text: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks. Hearings held.

committee.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

calendar.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.

action.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported to Senate by Senator Johnston with an amendment in the nature of a substitute. With written report No. 103-92.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 137.

vote.text: Passed Senate with an amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests and Public Lands.

committee.name: Senate Energy and Natural Resources
committee.subcommittee: Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

committee.name: House Natural Resources
committee.subcommittee: National Parks, Forests, and Public Lands

bill.summary: 7/21/1993--Passed Senate amended. Na Hoa Pili Kaloko-Honokohau Re-establishment Act of 1993 - Re-establishes the Na Hoa Pili O Kaloko-Honokohau (the Advisory Commission for Kaloko-Honokohau National Historical Park), in accordance with provisions of the National Parks and Recreation Act of 1978.
